overview: As Vice President, Ad Product and Monetization, David looks after ad product development and strategy, and partner product implementations. Prior to joining WhitePages.com, David was Director of Global Product at Travelport Corporate Solutions (Orbitz), where he developed new product launches on five continents, as well as development of an industry-leading travel policy engine. David has also held senior product management and marketing positions at OAG, Participate Systems, and United Airlines. He holds an MBA from the University of Chicago, and a BA in Business Administration from The Ohio State University.

relationships.title: Vice President, Ad Product and Monetization
